meanings.definition: An acceptance that something exists or is true, especially without proof.
meanings.sent1: Her belief in magic made her think anything was possible.
meanings.sent2: His belief in aliens led him to search the night sky for signs of life.
meanings.sent3: Despite his belief in ghosts, he still got scared watching horror movies.
meanings.sent4: Her belief in karma guided her to always do good deeds.
meanings.sent5: The child's belief in Santa Claus was evident in the excitement on Christmas Eve.

meanings.definition: A firmly held opinion or conviction.
meanings.sent1: His strong belief in honesty made him a trustworthy friend.
meanings.sent2: Their belief in teamwork helped them achieve success in the competition.
meanings.sent3: Even his belief in pineapple on pizza couldn't convince his friends to try it.
meanings.sent4: Her belief in the power of positive thinking transformed her life.
meanings.sent5: The team's belief in each other's abilities made them unstoppable.
